extendedInfo.description: How do you Paint Lightning? Draw perfectly shaped yellow Lightning? NO, just doodle anything you want using Paint Lightning - Draw n Sound!Drawing should be fun even before you finish. You shouldnât have to be an artist to have fun using your phone. Paint Lightning - Draw n Sound! makes your turns your mindless doodle into hours of fun! You will have so much fun while using Paint Lightning that you wonât care what picture you end up with! Once you try our Paint Lightning, you will Doodle anything and everything over and over just to see it in action again.Paint add special effects to your own photos and share it with the world! By email, Facebook, Tweeter, and much more. (social networking programs required).Paint yourself a Jedi Knight LightSaber!Draw in new Super Power for Iron Man!Of course after you Paint Lightning, you can Doodle a shiny rainbow!Then, simply shake the screen to clear! And start Drawing all over again!Drawing on your phone will never be the same! This is the most entertaining drawing app you will find. It cannot be described in words(not even in pictures!), please watch our video! Your kids(and you, too!) will be totally hooked, once you paint your very first Lightning!If you are looking for more serious, but simple and easy drawing app, download Picasso - Draw, Paint, Doodle!https://market.android.com/details?id=com.caramelizedapple.apps.PicassoKeyword: Paint, Draw, Doodle, Drawing Pad, Sketch, Fun, Glow, Easy, Masterpiece, Painting, Photo, Paint Joy, Picture, Touch, Finger paint, Coloring, Color, PaintBrush, Painter, Free Sketch, Photo, Fun, Photography, Sketch Pad, Photo Editing

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: After depressing myself with the state of \"serious\" pain apps for Android for myself (they\'re all useless junk), I ran across this one. And while this obviously isn\'t it, this one at least does what it says it does, and it does it well.  The sound and colors immediately made my 3 years old son interested.   So while I didn\'t get *my* paint app, at least he got a good one he\'ll probably keep using and have lots of fun with.  My one caveat is that I\'d rather pay for it than have ads in the apps my son uses.

reviews.title: GREAT 4 ALL AGES!!!!!
reviews.comment: This feature is fantastic!!!  Not only is it fun for kids, teens and adults but it is wonderful for entertaining a crying infant/toddler when your out in public.  They become completely mesmerized by the sounds and colors!!  It becomes a digital copy of some of the best tactile toys (specifically the ones that slightly change color as you move them and they make a crinkling noise). Great product!!!!
